price: Sε monsa ka tumi a, bͻne na ebia mobεyε no wͻ asaase no soͻ, na moatete moabusua ntam.
arabic: فَهَلۡ عَسَيۡتُمۡ إِن تَوَلَّيۡتُمۡ أَن تُفۡسِدُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَتُقَطِّعُوٓاْ أَرۡحَامَكُمۡ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fahal ʿasaytum in tawallaytum an tuf'sidū fī al-arḍi watuqaṭṭiʿū arḥāmakum
